[@microsoft/fast-foundation](./fast-foundation.md) &gt; [Switch](./fast-foundation.switch.md) &gt; [defaultChecked](./fast-foundation.switch.defaultchecked.md)

## Switch.defaultChecked property

Initialized to the value of the checked attribute. Can be changed independently of the "checked" attribute, but changing the "checked" attribute always additionally sets this value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defaultChecked: boolean;
```
